answers.answer: Oh yah.  As for how this bender has lasted.  I found my old post on June 28 th. 3 weeks later my brother died.  After 2 weeks I relapsed.   Just a few vikes here and there then I wanna say 4 months ago I hit the OC again.  Only once right??? That one time has left me wondering where the time went.  It wasn't until late November I got up to 2.5 80s a day.   I couldn't stop.  But I did.  I ran out, ( for the last time) and took suboxone.  TERRIBLE w/ds.  If I could have found something to take.  I think I wouldn't be here to write this.  6 days later I'm off everything.

Sounds to me you are doing incredibly well. I have been trying to spread the news about Whey Protein. I had the energy of a sloth until I found out about it. There are several kinds. I use the" Enternet" Brand. And" Health Wise" I would love some feed back if you try it. It seemed to work so fast and so well for me I can hardly believe it. Body builders use it and it's at most pharmacies. The place I got mine was "Healthy Weight Supermarket" evidently it is helpful to people with diabetes and people struggling with weight loss too.

question: Hello y'all! I'm back again.  Took a month off the oxy and relapsed...:'(.      This time I have to do this right.  My business, which is in the shts now due to my lack of interest in anything other than pills and my next score.  The lies that I've told my wife when she asks me if I'm using... The list goes on.... The truth is.   I've hit my rock bottom.   I've been sober for 6 days.  Clean from oxy for 12 days.  Clean from suboxone since Christmas day.   I need to get myself together for my family.  I know I can do this.  Things have been ok as for WDs other than just being weak.  I stopped using OC at220 mgs a day.  Snortin 40 every few hours or sooner.  Found a good formula for suboxone with minimal withdrawl.  Again the worst is Weakness.  No energy.  Any thoughts on how to bring me back up WITHOUT opiates.  The suboxone was great but I chose not to live a life supplimenting one opiate for the next.  So here I am.  Weak.  Should it last much longer???
title: Weak after suboxone detox
